title: Newsrooms build the muscle to survive many futures at once
description: In the coming year, the newsrooms that thrive won’t be the ones chasing the next platform change, algorithm tweak, or business model that might save us. They will be the ones preparing for multiple realities at once, with focus, steadiness, and a plan. My prediction is simple: Scenario planning — done consistently, cross-functionally and proactively...
